__e: To save him and him, an hour for each.
Saving you and your men... was the first time in all my years of service I actually felt powerful.
How long before I'll have to step in and save him, or what's left of him... and what's left of you and your family name?
But if you want to save him from himself, then I'll help you but not for myself and not for him.
You're the only man who can save him from this mad thing that's happening.
You know, I know you want to save him from all that he'll go through, but I think you're doing the right thing.
